run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Network.Server.ClientHandler
Method that defines an input and output stream for the server It handles the connection with the client on server side (it is the counterpart of server handler) the input is used to listen to any command that the client will send to server the output is used by the server to send commands to the client
